title: About Us
meta_description: Learn about Maison Guida, a sustainable luxury brand committed to ethical fashion, eco-friendly materials, and Italian craftsmanship.
main_content:
## About Us



## Welcome to Maison Guida



## Our Story: Sustainable Luxury Fashion with an Italian Heart


At Maison Guida, ethical fashion is at the heart of everything we do. From locally sourcing eco-friendly materials to crafting sustainable luxury clothing and accessories in Italy, we are committed to creating timeless collections with purpose.


## Ethical Practices and Eco-Friendly Materials


We combine the artistry of traditional design with the efficiency of technology, leveraging AI, CLO3D, and digital printing to reduce waste and perfect our designs before production.


## A New Approach to Luxury


Luxury means conscious choices, exceptional quality, and timeless designs. We proudly source local fabrics and up-cycle materials, creating eco-friendly, elegant pieces.


## Handcrafted in Turin, Designed for the World


We've been around for over 12 years and we’re here to inspire a movement toward sustainable, ethical, thoughtful fashion that reflects who you are and what you stand for.

Be the first to discover all the latest news, products and trends!

​Thanks for registering!

We use cookies to provide you a better user experience on this website.Cookie Policy

title: Consegna e Resi | Maison Guida
main_content:
## Delivery and Returns



## Delivery


In Italy

- Delivery is free in Italy (Europaco + Insurance)

International

- Delivery is byeuropaco.comwith insurance included. Price details are on the checkout page.

- For any special requests and if your country is not listed, please write to us and we'll do everything possible to send your order!


## Returns


To make a return/exchange request please send your order number, email and details tojohn@marikaguida.com.

Please note that for returns, shipping costs will be your responsibility. Once your return has been received, allow 3 days for processing and validation. Once validated by our team, you will receive your refund within the following 14 working days.

Please note that shipping costs will be free if you would like to request one exchange. Once your return has been received, allow 4 to 5 days for processing and validation. Once validated by our team, your exchange will be shipped as soon as possible to the address indicated in your email.

You can of course come to our store in Turin for an Exchange or Return.

Products must be returned in their original condition, new, unworn and undamaged suitable for resale.

In the event of non-compliance with these conditions, no return may be subject to a refund or credit.

Damaged or incomplete clothing, products and/or accessories (missing label, soiled, with traces of foundation or smell, torn, holed, etc...) will not be refunded. Do not wear and return, it's obvious!

Once the return has been received and validated, reimbursement is made within 14 working days.

Any feedback made differently cannot be taken into account.

Be the first to discover all the latest news, products and trends!

​Thanks for registering!

title: Marika Guida | Collection 2021
meta_description: Discover the Maison Guida Collection, where contemporary style meets timeless Italian craftsmanship. Each piece is handmade using locally sourced, eco-friendly fabrics, embodying the principles of slow fashion and bespoke design. With minimalist elegance, our collection offers unique, high-quality pieces that celebrate both sustainability and sophistication. Experience luxury redefined with Maison Guida’s commitment to quality, style, and a uniquely Italian aesthetic.

title: Privacy Policy
meta_description: Describes the privacy policy for Maison Guida website
main_content:
## Privacy Policy



## Terms of Service


These terms of service ("Terms", "Agreement") are an agreement between the website ("Website operator", "us", "we" or "our") and you ("User", "you" or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of this website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services").


## Links to other Websites


Although this Website may be linked to other websites, we are not, directly or indirectly, implying any approval, association, sponsorship, endorsement, or affiliation with any linked website, unless specifically stated herein.

You should carefully review the legal statements and other conditions of use of any website which you access through a link from this Website. Your linking to any other off-site pages or other websites is at your own risk.


## Use of Cookies


Website may use cookies to personalize and facilitate maximum navigation of the User by this site. The User may configure his / her browser to notify and reject the installation of the cookies sent by us.


## Our Privacy Policy


This web site is managed by Collezione Privata di Guida Marika.

By using and visiting our sitewww.maisonguida.comand submitting your personal data, you agree to use your personal information as set out in this privacy policy.

We respect the privacy of our users and recognize that when you choose to provide personal information, you rely on responsible actions. This policy statement contains important information on how we use your personal information.

Who is the owner of your personal data?

Collezione Privata di Guida Marika is the owner of the personal data submitted and therefore is responsible for the processing of data provided online, in accordance with applicable data protection law.

Collezione Privata di Guida Marika

Lungo Po Alessandro Antonelli, 7 10153 Torino Italia P.IVA 10546090019

Which informations do we collect?

Sometimes we may ask you to voluntarily provide us with personal information. Generally this information is required when you want us to provide you with information. We may collect the following information about you: Name - Email address - IP address (a unique identifier for your computer or other device) - Mobile device ID - Information provided by you in relation to the purchase of a product - Information provided by you in relation to the submission of a job application with us - Information provided by you in relation to the request for information about our products or the request for advice - Other information provided by you through our forms, emails, newsletters.

How do we use them?

We will use this information in the following ways:

- To allow you to purchase one of our products - To allow you to receive one of our products at an address indicated by you - To allow you to receive more information about a product, an event, a workshop - To provide you with the information you have requested, e.g. Newsletter - Provide better ways to access information from this website - To process and consider your job and/ or collaboration application - To process and consider the request for advice.

Do we share your information with third parties?

We will not transmit your information to third parties unless we reasonably believe required by law and in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding suspicious or actually illegal or otherwise prohibited activity, including, but not limited to, fraud.

How do we use your information for marketing?

We will only provide you with the information you have requested via the website.

Where do we send your information?

Newsletter: Your information will be stored with Mailerlite in accordance with their privacy policy Payments: Your information will be handled with PayPal and Stripe in accordance with their privacy policy

How long will we keep your information?

We will keep your information for a reasonable period for the purposes set out above.

What rights does the user have?

Right of access: You have the right to request information about the personal data we hold about you at any time. You may contact Maison Guida (john@marikaguida.com), which will provide all personal data by email.

Right to rectification: You have the right to request rectification of personal data if they are incorrect, including the right to request the completion of incomplete personal data. You may contact Guida on demand (john@marikaguida.com), which will proceed with the correction by email. Right to erasure/Right to be forgotten: You have the right to delete any personal data processed by Maison Guida (john@marikaguida.com), at any time, except in the following situations: the user has an open debt with Collezione Privata di Guide Marika You are suspected of, or have fraudulently used our services.

Your right to object to direct marketing: You have the right to object to direct marketing, including profiling carried out for direct marketing, by the following means: following the instructions when subscribing to the newsletter with Mailerlite in accordance with their privacy policy by unsubscribing at any time, at the bottom of each newsletter received.

How can you assert your rights?

Data protection is very important to us. You can contact Maison Guida (john@marikaguida.com), who will provide you with all the information via email.


## Cookies


We may use information obtained from cookies or similar technology. Cookies are text files containing small amounts of information that we download to your computer or device when you visit our website. Therefore, when we refer to “you” in this section we mean your computer. We may recognize these cookies on subsequent visits and allow us to remember you. Our website links to third-party sites that we do not operate or support. These websites may use cookies and collect personal information in accordance with their own privacy policies. This privacy policy does not apply to third-party websites for which we are not responsible.

Third-party cookies and their privacy policy

PayPal and Stripe are services that allow you to make secure payments by credit card on e-commerce like ours. Guida on demand does not have access to your personal information relating to your Credit Card, which will instead be managed directly by PayPal and Stripe according to their Privacy policy and Cookie Policy.

To manage the website and store we use odoo, an open source ERP.

Google Analytics with anonymized IP (Google Inc.)

Google Analytics is a web analytics service provided by Google Inc. (“Google”). Google uses the Personal Data collected for the purpose of tracking and examining the use of this application, compiling reports and sharing them with other services developed by Google. Google may use Personal Data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its advertising network. This integration of Google Analytics anonymizes your IP address. The anonymization works by shortening the IP address of Users within the borders of the member states of the European Union or in other countries adhering to the Agreement on the European Economic Area. Only in exceptional cases will the IP address be sent to Google’s servers and shortened within the United States. Personal Data collected: Cookies and Usage Data. Place of processing: USA - Privacy Policy –Opt Out.

User ID extension for Google Analytics (Google Inc.) Google Analytics on this application uses a feature called User ID. This allows a more accurate tracking of Users by assigning each one a unique ID for various sessions and devices, but in such a way as not to allow Google to personally identify an individual or permanently identify a specific device. The User ID extension also allows you to connect Data from Google Analytics with other data relating to the user collected by this application. The Opt Out link provided below allows you to disable tracking for the device you are using, but does not exclude further tracking activities carried out by the Owner. To deactivate the latter, contact the owner via the contact email address.

Personal Data collected: Cookies. Place of processing: USA - Privacy Policy - Opt Out. Widget Google Maps (Google Inc.) Google Maps is a map visualization service managed by Google Inc. that allows this Application to integrate such content within its pages. Personal data collected: Cookies and Usage Data. Place of processing: USA - Privacy Policy. Widget Video YouTube (Google Inc.) YouTube is a video content viewing service managed by Google Inc. that allows this application to integrate such content within its pages. Personal Data collected: Cookies and Usage Data. Place of processing: USA - Privacy Policy. Social widgets Google+ Third-party widgets, such as Google+, may be embedded on the site. These Widgets may set third-party cookies on your computer or mobile device, in order to improve functionality. The purpose of these cookies is described in the privacy policy of the owners:www.google.it/intl/it/policies/privacyFacebook Widgets from third parties, such as Facebook, may be embedded on the site. These Widgets may set third-party cookies on your computer or mobile device, in order to improve functionality. The purpose of these cookies is described in the privacy policy of the owners:www.facebook.com/policy.phpLinkedIn Nel sito possono essere incorporati Widget di terze parti, quali LinkedIn. Questi Widget potrebbero impostare cookies di terze parti sul computer o sul dispositivo mobile, per poter migliorare le funzionalità. La finalità di questi cookies è descritta nell’informativa per la privacy dei proprietari:it.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policyInstagram Third-party widgets, such as Instagram, may be embedded on the site. These Widgets may set third-party cookies on your computer or mobile device, in order to improve functionality. The purpose of these cookies is described in the privacy policy of the owners:instagram.com/about/legal/privacy


## Contact Information


How do we protect your data?

We take appropriate measures to ensure that the personal information you disclose to us is kept secure, accurate and up-todate and kept only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it is used.

How to get a copy of your information?

You have the right to request a copy of the information we hold about you and to correct any inaccuracies in your information. Please contact us using the details given below.

How to contact us if your information or choices change?

If your personal information or preferences change, you do not want us to send you the information you requested, or if you have any questions about how we use your personal information, please let us know by contacting us using the details set out below.

Changes to this privacy policy

We reserve the right, at our discretion, to change, modify, add or remove portions of this privacy policy at any time. We are encouraged to review this privacy policy from time to time.

Collezione Privata di Guida Marika

Lungo Po Alessandro Antonelli, 7 - 10153 Torino Italy P.IVA 11717490012

Tel. +39 351 781 4608 emailjohn@marikaguida.com

Thank you for reading this far!

Be the first to discover all the latest news, products and trends!

​Thanks for registering!

We use cookies to provide you a better user experience on this website.Cookie Policy

title: Terms and Conditions | Maison Guida
meta_description: General terms and conditions for the Maison Guida site
main_content:
## Terms and Conditions



## Legal


These terms of service ("Terms", "Agreement") are an agreement between the website ("Website operator", "us", "we" or "our") and you ("User", "you" or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of this website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services").


## General Conditions


The following conditions are valid exclusively between Maison Guida (Collezione Privata di Guida Marika Lungo Po Alessandro Antonelli, 7 10153 Torino Italia P.IVA 10546090019) and any person who purchases on thewww.maisonguida.comwebsite, herein after referred to as Customer.

The following conditions may be subject to changements, the date it is online is equivalent to the date of validity.

The following general sale conditions govern purchases made on the websitewww.maisonguida.com, in accordance with articles 50 and following of Legislative Decree no. 206 of 6 September 2005, of the Consumer Code, section II of Chapter I of Title III of Part Three, to which reference should be made as required by art. 60 of the Consumer Code.

With the following general sale conditions Maison Guida sells and Customer remotely purchases the goods for sale on the sitewww.maisonguida.com.

The contract is concluded exclusively through the internet, through the Customer’s access to the www.maisonguida.comaddress and the realization of a purchase order according to the procedure provided by the site itself.

The sale is considered concluded with the sending of the order by Maison Guida to Customer.

Customer undertakes to verify the correctness of personal data, size, fit of the same verifiable in the appropriate size tables at the link 'fitting room' indicated at the time of buying on the product page.

Conscious purchasing eliminates unnecessary travel to the couriers and their consequent pollution. Let’s help the planet the best we can.

Maison Guida undertakes to present the items sold on the site in the best way, providing as much information as possible consisting of photos, descriptions, measurements, technical details, compositions and garment care instructions, in order to allow Customer to make the purchase safely.

The products not defined unique size have been graded on EU standard tables, whose measurements are expressed in the aforementioned tables. Maison Guida will therefore not be responsible for incorrect fitting on particular anatomical conformations. The product is not to be considered tailor-made, unless expressly agreed between the parties through the special “made on measures” service.

Maison Guida undertakes to deliver the goods within 30 days from the day following the order confirmation by Customer.


## Payment Methods


Each payment of the Customer can only be made with the payment methods indicated on the site: PayPal or Credit Card (Stripe). Through PayPal Customer can pay directly with the proper PayPal account or by credit card. For PayPal payments, if the unavailability of a product is detected after the registration of the order Guide on demand will implement all necessary measures with the payment operator to reverse the transaction relating to the unavailable goods.

In addition, communications relating to payment and data communicated by Customer, at the time of payment, are protected and with all the guarantees ensured by the use of security protocols provided by the payment circuits. For more information about PayPal:www.paypal.com


## Product Availability


All product orders are subject to product availability. In this sense, in case of supply problems, or if there are no items in stock, we reserve the right to provide Customer with information relating to replacement products of equal or higher quality and value, which may decide to order. If Customer doesn’t wish to place an order for such replacement products, we will refund any amounts Customer may have already paid. Eventually, the site automatically stops the selling of the products out of stock before checking out.


## Price


All items for sale are VAT excluded, VAT to pay will be indicated at the checkout.

Shipping costs are not included in the purchase price, but are calculated at check-out and shown before completing this operation.

Any customs fees are charged to Customer.


## Delivery Methods


Maison Guida will only accept orders to be delivered in the EU, Customers from other provenience are invited to get in touch directly mailing tojohn@marikaguida.com.

The products will be delivered by express courier to the address indicated by Customer in the order.

At the same time as sending the Orders, Maison Guida will send a regular receipt to Customer. For the purpose of issuing the purchase receipt, the information provided by Customer shall prevail. No change to the receipt will be possible after its issuance by Maison Guida.


## Rights of Withdrawal


In accordance with the legal provisions in force, Customer has the right to withdraw from the purchase without specifying the reason, within a period of 14 days provided for by law, starting from the date of delivery of the products, by sending an email to john@marikaguida.com or a registered letter to Collezione Privata di Guida Marika, Piazza Vittorio Veneto, 14 10123 Torino.

The goods must be returned to us at the address below.

According to the law, the shipping costs related to the return and insurance of the goods are charged to Customer.

The goods must be returned intact and complete in all its parts, labels and attached tax documentation. Without prejudice to the right to verify compliance with the above, Maison Guida will issue as soon as possible and in any case within a maximum period of 30 days a voucher of the same amount of the returned goods, or the re-sending of a replacement garment chosen by the Customer, corresponding differences in the price where there were need.

In case of receipt of products that do not comply with the orders or defective Customer must communicate it, as required by art. 132 of the Consumer Code, by e-mail to john@marikaguida.com within 1 week from the discovery of the defect. Subsequently, the customer must communicate by same email the wish to replace the item with a similar one or to obtain a voucher of the same amount against the return of the defective goods. Customer will ship it back on proper expenses. Maison Guida reserves the right to verify the disputed non-compliance and only in the case of confirmation will it ship the replacement goods or issue the voucher, shipment included.


## Product Warranty


Maison Guida assumes no responsibility for disruptions due to force majeure or unforeseeable circumstances, even if dependent on malfunctions and disruptions of the internet, in the event that it fails to execute the order within the time stipulated in the contract.

The availability of each item is only indicative, has no contractual nature and can not be attributed to the seller responsibility in case of unavailability of one or more products.

All content on this site and related domains are the exclusive property of Maison Guida. This includes images, documents, fonts, design elements, code, and format scripts. All material published within the portal is protected. It is therefore forbidden to use, reproduce, distribute, publish, reproduce and alter the contents present.

These General Sale Conditions consist of all the clauses that compose them. If one or more provisions of these General Conditions of Sale is considered invalid or declared as such under the law, regulation or following a decision by a court having jurisdiction, the other provisions will continue to have full force and effect.

These General Conditions of Sale are subject to Italian law. Any dispute that does not find an amicable solution will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Court of Turin, if located in the territory of the State.

Thank you for reading this far!


## Contact Information


Company:

Collezione Privata di Guida Marika

Lungo Po Alessandro Antonelli, 7 10153, Torino Italy

john@marikaguida.com

Tel. +39 351 781 4608

Shop:

Piazza Vittorio Veneto, 14 10123, Torino Italy

marika@marikaguida.com

P.IVA 10546090019

Support:john@marikaguida.com

​Thanks for registering!

title: Sustainable Luxury Fashion Handmade in Italy
meta_description: Discover Maison Guida’s eco-friendly luxury fashion. Handmade in Turin, our ethical collections emphasize sustainability and timeless elegance.
meta_keywords: Sustainable luxury fashion,Ethical fashion,Vegan clothing,Eco-friendly materials,Cruelty-free fashion,Organic fabrics,Vibrant prints
main_content:
## Sustainable Luxury Fashion Handmade in Italy


Piazza Vittorio | Turin

SHOP NOW


## Handmade in Italy


Discover More


## MAISON GUIDA | We Believe in Fashion with Purpose



## At Maison Guida, we believe in redefining fashion by blending timeless elegance with conscious craftsmanship. We challenge the fast fashion industry by creating sustainable, ethically made pieces that empower modern individuals to express their values through style. Everything we do is rooted in our passion for Italian heritage, impeccable design, and a commitment to slow fashion. Our collections are not just clothes; they are a statement of mindful luxury - crafted in Turin, designed for those who believe fashion should stand for something greater. Do you believe in fashion with purpose?



## Be Unique



## Be Original


See Winter


## Be Unique


All Seasons

See Winter

All Seasons


## Be Original



## new arrivals



## Ne​w In



## discover our sustainable clothing



## Also for men


SHOP MEN​​


## artisan fashion design


Marika Guidafor Maison Guida

Over a decade ago, Marika opened her first boutique on Via Saluzzo, though her journey in designing and creating exquisite fashion began long before that. Last year, we expanded to a beautiful new store in the heart of Turin at Piazza Vittorio 14, giving us the perfect space to welcome both locals and tourists. As we continue to grow, we're excited to rebrand and launch our new website, bringing our designs to the world.

Stop by our store to explore the latest collections, enjoy custom-made pieces, take advantage of exclusive offers, or simply have a chat. We look forward to seeing you!

​

View mo​re


## testimonials​


The perfect opportunity to find what you will never find anywhere, original is an understatement, Marika is as unique as her creations, you will find friendliness, smiles and certainly what you were looking for.

A beautiful boutique, to be included in an original shopping itinerary in Turin, away from the big brands. A stylist passionate about her work who offers few pieces, but elaborate, and above all beautiful!

I received the parcel. The coat is fantastic. Thank you so much. I am looking forward to wearing it tomorrow in Viareggio where rain is forecast!

I love my rain jacket from this store! It’s custom, and so flattering and chic.

title: Maison Guida
meta_description: Every time you buy you support a brand and its values and the impact it will have on the world.
main_content:
Ottobre 2024


## Price Policy


by John Watkinson

Every time you buy you support a brand and its values and the impact it will have on the world.

The artisans invest a lot of time, skill and effort in the creation of each piece.

We use quality and organic materials, which have a higher cost especially in small quantities.

We produce on a small scale, unlike mass-produced items, and this limits our ability to absorb the financial impact on our sales.

We support the slow fashion movement

Pay the right price, we don't have fake discounts.

We are ethical and slow fashion artisans, we design and produce everything ourselves, including the dry-printing of the fabrics: don't ask us for sales!

title: Maison Guida
meta_description: Guida on Tour, we'll be at the Artisans of Excellence Faire in NOVARA
main_content:
March 2024


## Guida on Tour


We are thrilled to announce that Atlier Guida is hitting the road for an exciting journey! We have been invited to participate in the Artisans of Excellence Faire in NOVARA on the 16 and 17 March 2024. This marks an incredible opportunity for us to connect with our cherished customers, showcase our latest collections, and spread the essence of our brand far and wide.

As we prepare to set up our booth at the artisan faire, we are brimming with excitement to share our passion for fashion with each and every one of you. From the vibrant colors of our designs to the intricate details of our craftsmanship, there's something truly special about experiencing our collections up close and personal.

Curious to see what we've been working on? You're in for a treat! At the artisan faire, we will be showcasing our newest collection, fresh off the runway. Whether you're drawn to statement pieces that command attention or timeless classics that exude elegance, there's a little something for everyone in our carefully curated selection.

But wait, there's more! To show our appreciation for your unwavering support, we're rolling out some exclusive offers that you won't want to miss. From special discounts to limited-time promotions, now is the perfect opportunity to treat yourself to that piece you've been eyeing or surprise a loved one with a thoughtful gift.

Mark your calendars and save the date! We'll be making our debut at the artisan faire in Novara, and we would love nothing more than to meet you in person. Whether you're a longtime fan of Atelier Guida or simply curious to learn more about who we are and what we stand for, we invite you to stop by our booth, say hello, and immerse yourself in the world of GuidaOnDemand.

As we gear up for this exciting adventure, we extend our heartfelt gratitude to each and every one of you for your unwavering support. Your enthusiasm fuels our passion, and we can't wait to share this unforgettable experience with you. So come along, join us on tour, and let's make memories together at the artisan faire. We'll see you there!

Warmest regards,

Atelier Guida - GuidaOnDemand

title: Maison Guida
main_content:
Giugno 2022

In the last few years, there has been a significant shift towards more sustainable and ethical practices in various industries, including fashion. As conscious consumers become more aware of the environmental impact of animal products, the demand for vegan alternatives has skyrocketed. Among these alternatives, vegan leather has emerged as a revolutionary material that offers a cruelty-free and eco-friendly solution. In this blog post, we will explore the fascinating world of vegan leather, its benefits, and its contribution to a more sustainable future.


## Understanding Vegan Leather


Vegan leather, is a material that mimics the look and feel of genuine animal leather without using any animal products. It is typically made from a variety of materials plant-based like pineapple leaves (Piñatex) apple peels (AppleSkin),  Grape leftovers or Cactus.These alternatives provide a cruelty-free and sustainable option for fashion


## The Benefits of Vegan Leather


1Cruelty-FreeThe most prominent advantage of vegan leather is its animal-friendly nature. No animals are harmed or killed in the production of vegan leather, making it a compassionate choice for ethically conscious consumers.

2Environmental SustainabilityTraditional leather production involves harmful chemicals, enormous water consumption, and deforestation. Vegan leather significantly reduces these negative environmental impacts. Synthetic materials like PVC or PU are more resource-efficient and have a lower carbon footprint. Moreover, plant-based alternatives utilize agricultural waste, reducing the need for additional land and resources.

3Versatility and InnovationVegan leather comes in a wide range of textures, colors, and finishes, offering a plethora of options for fashion designers and consumers. Its versatility allows for experimentation and creativity in design, enabling the production of unique and stylish products.

4DurabilityVegan leather has come a long way in terms of durability. With advancements in manufacturing techniques, modern vegan leather can be just as durable as its animal-derived counterpart. It can withstand daily wear and tear, making it a practical choice for various fashion items, such as shoes, bags, and jackets.

5AccessibilityUnlike genuine leather, which is often associated with luxury and high prices, vegan leather is generally more affordable. Its accessibility allows a broader range of consumers to embrace sustainable fashion without compromising on style or quality.


## The Future of Vegan Leather


As the fashion industry continues to prioritize sustainability, the future of vegan leather looks promising. Researchers and innovators are constantly exploring new materials and production methods to enhance the quality, durability, and sustainability of vegan leather. From incorporating bio-based materials to developing innovative recycling techniques, the possibilities for eco-friendly leather alternatives are expanding rapidly.


## Embracing Vegan Leather


Transitioning to vegan leather is an excellent step towards promoting a sustainable and cruelty-free fashion industry. By supporting brands that use vegan leather, you contribute to the demand for ethical and environmentally friendly materials. Additionally, spreading awareness about the benefits of vegan leather within your community can inspire others to make conscious choices and embrace a compassionate lifestyle.

Vegan leather is more than just a trend; it represents a significant shift towards a more sustainable and compassionate future. By opting for vegan leather products, you can make a positive impact on the environment, animals, and the fashion industry as a whole. Let's embrace the power of vegan leather and encourage a fashion revolution that prioritizes ethics and sustainability. Together, we can shape a world where style and compassion go hand in hand.


## Atelier Guida Design


Here atGuidaOnDemand, we have been using Vegan Leather in our bags and garments for a number of years. The vegan leather we use is from an Italian manufacture and is made of a bio-compound characerized by a content of plant based raw materials, which is spread on sustainable backing textiles. The backing is recycled polyester while the front is a coating of 65% grape and resins and 45% water based PU and is both light and strong with a great look and texture.

Checkout our accessories page for our Vegan Leather range!!
